ESRI.Configuration.Name: Atlas Georeference and Clip
ESRI.Configuration.Description: Tool for automatically georeferencing and clipping scanned atlas images
ESRI.Configuration.Author: JHU Sheridan Libraries

ComboBox.caption: Select Image
ComboBox.message: Select the map image you'd like to geo reference and clip.
ComboBox.tip: Select the map image you'd like to geo reference and clip.

Tool.caption: Select Points
Tool.message: Select the four corners of the image to clip.
Tool.tip: Select the four corners of the image to clip.

Help.heading: Select The Corners of the Map

Tool.Help: Select the four corners of the map image without the borders. Starting in the top left and working clockwise to the bottom left.

Button.caption: Run
Button.message: Will georeference and clip the selected image

ComboBox.caption: ShapeFile
ComboBox.message: Select the shapefile for baltimore city used to georeference the atlas images.
ComboBox.tip: Select the shapefile of the baltimore city grid
